text:
Delighted to welcome @ThomsonAngus @UNICEF for our first #ISNTDConnect of 2021, outlining #vaccine misinformation, infodemics and solutions.

"Managing vaccine misinformation & building vaccine demand in the #COVID19 era"

Catch the recording here: 
https://t.co/lAkqsNTqvX https://t.co/sG1Smn4eKa
